title: Anna Soubry – 2020 Comments on UK/EU Trade Deal
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Anna Soubry on 24 December 2020.
content:
Never before has a country so spectacularly shot its self in the foot. We are no longer “Great” Britain or a United Kingdom. Leaving the European Union, the single market and customs union diminishes our country, will make us all a little poorer and narrow our horizons.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance
  *[
  ESA
 ]: Employment and Support Allowance
